name: Decompression (itch)
description:
We tried to convey realistic dive control.
WASD + Mouse - move.
- Q, E - turn.
- R - reset rotation
Watch your buoyancy, it depends on the volume of air in the BCD and in the lungs.
To control the volume of air in the BCD, use an inflator.
- F key - get the inflator
- LMB - increase air volume in BCD
- RMB - reduce
Lungs ones allow you to control buoyancy more precisely.
- Mouse wheel up - increase the volume of air in the lungs
- Mouse wheel down - reduce the volume of air in the lungs

Your goal - find a 5 pieces of data inside shipwreck
